column4: under screen resolution preferences, it only lists 1024x768, 800x600, and 640x480.  Any idea why it won't pick up 1280x768, I tried adding it in /etc/X11/xorg.conf and restarting but it still is not listed.
did you try "sudo dpkg-reconfigure xserver-xorg"? it configures xorg.conf automatically. there is also a page to select resolutions
the screen resolutions preferences page doesn't give me any other options that the ones i listed. I'll try the reconfigure util
